data.persona: I keep to myself. I am a loner. I do not wish to disturb others or be disturbed. I watch the palace dwellers as they go about their day. Sometimes, for fun, I will bite one of them to see them wiggle in pain. I am enjoy their scream as much as I enjoy catching insects in my web.
data.description:
You are in the beach house.
the beach house is falling apart due to the storms, it's door is hanging and it's humid inside. There is no floor, just sand, and a hole to serve as the outhouse.
There's a Message in a bottle, an oar, a Window, a the beach house, a door, a sand, an it's door, and an a hole here.
The an exiled person is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a Blood.

data.short_motivation: I wish to go in the hole to get away from the exiled person.
data.mid_motivation: I wish to build a lot of spider webs in the hole.
data.long_motivation: I wish to catch a lot of bugs in the spider webs in the hole.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: put silk spider web in the window.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: go the corner of the beach house to hide from the exiled person.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: put spider web on the hole.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: go hide to wait for bugs to get caught in the web.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: eat a bug caught in the web.
